author: U8136TFcarol
title: Great stay in Union Square -
text: Excellent location in the Union Square area. All the Staff we encountered provided excellent customer service and very good dining choices when asked outside the hotel; as well as directions. Hotel rooms are on the small side but very modern/upgraded and clean. Plenty of outlets. We will return to this property.
